reviewText: The comment on Amazon as the decadence of Roma is misleading. This movie is raw sex and has no history content whatsoever. I don't care for porn movies or whoever wants to watch them, but don't like that the comment about the movie is wrong. It should be clasified as an X rated movie.
Wonderful view of the decadence of Rome.
Do not waste your time.  Its sad because their are a lot of good actors in this film.
this movie has been completed edited. not your father's Caligula.
was not the version i thought i was ordering
Scenes was cut . I'm ordering the unrated one the anniversary blue case . Where the movie is not cut up . Upset
The copy freezes and skips...that sucks....
Poorly edited to eliminate any graphic violence or sexual content. What is left is a confusing mishmash of disjointed partial scenes that makes virtually no sense. Complete waste of money and time.
